title: Krawsah chuan thisen hlu a awm
lyrics:
Kraws-ah chuan thisen hlu a awm,
Kraws thianghlim chu ka hmu;
Thisen chu Isuan min hriattir,
Ka tan hmana luang kha.

Aw, thisen ropui ber chu,
Isuan a tuarna chu,
Kraws chungah thisen hlu a luang,
Rinnain ka lo hmu.

Kraws chu, aw, kraws rit tak mai chu,
Isuan ka tan a pu,
Lungngai taka a tuarna kha,
Kalvari-an a nghat.

A zang em kraws hlu tak mai chu?
Kraws chu ka han thlir a;
Ka phur kang ve thei dawn emaw
Ka bei ang kraun awm chu.

Lallukhum ropui ber mai chu,
Hnehtu Lallukhum chu,
Vanah Isua ka hmuh hunin,
Kei pawh ka khum ve ang.

Ka mittui a tla tawh lo vang,
Hmangaih reh lohnaah;
Khawvel ata min hruai chhua
k la,
Lawmna hmun min thlen la.
